title: EAU DE PERFUME INTENSE
subtitle: A woody amber note with a powerful character
text: This Eau de Parfum Intense spray ensures a rich and gentle application on the skin or on the inside of clothing. Apply it every day, before your appointments or every evening on the wrists, behind the ears and behind the knees to achieve a more intense sillage. You can intensify the sillage by using the entire bath and body range.
